title: Albania’s c-bank FX reserves rise 25% y/y in Oct
Albania sells 28.7 million euro of 2032 T-notes
Albania sells 41.6 mln euro 2030 T-notes, above target
Bank of Albania Buys €800 Million to Support the Lek
description:
The strengthening of the Albanian lek against foreign currencies has prompted the Bank of Albania to purchase €800 million this year, while the country’s foreign exchange reserves have risen to €7.2 billion.

title: Albania Sees Seven Percent Growth in Visitor Arrivals in this Year, Strengthening Its Position as a Year-Round Travel Destination and Boosting the Local Economy
description:

title: Fatos Nano obituary
description:
Whether he was in government or in jail, Fatos Nano was one of the two figures, along with his arch-rival, Sali Berisha, who dominated Albania’s political scene in the turbulent 15 years that began with the disintegration of Communist party rule in 1990.

title: Deputy Finance Minister Memeti: ‘Albania strengthens fiscal stability, becomes more attractive for investment’
description:
TIRANA, November 26 – Deputy Finance Minister Andi Memeti took part in the 2024 Global Banking Market Forum in Istanbul. The event brought together financial-sector representatives, international institutions, and global investors.

title: EC keeps Albania’s 2025 GDP growth projection at 3.6%
Albania's annual inflation slows to 2.2% in Oct
IMF raises Albania's 2025 economic growth projection to 3.5%
Interest Rates Remain Unchanged, Sejko: The Albanian Economy Continues to Grow
description:
The Supervisory Council of the Bank of Albania decided on Wednesday to keep its key interest rates unchanged, assessing that the current stance of monetary policy remains appropriate for maintaining price stability and supporting economic growth.
